      • setResistance

        public void setResistance(java.lang.String key,
                 Direction edge,
                 float resistance)
        Description copied from interface: EdgeAwareCell
        Sets the resistance value to associate with the provided key. If a resistance value was previously associated with the key, then that value is overwritten with the new value.
